TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SupportingTokenSpecification extends System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenSpecification

Docs.summary: Represents a supporting security token and its authorization policies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Supporting tokens augment the claims provided by the token associated with the message signature. There are 4 different kinds of supporting tokens, and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SupportingTokenSpecification.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode%2A> enumeration specifies which kind this instance is.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> tokenPolicies, valuetype System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode attachmentMode) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection of security token policies.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public SupportingTokenSpecification (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> tokenPolicies, System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode attachmentMode, System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters tokenParameters);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> tokenPolicies, valuetype System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode attachmentMode, class System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters tokenParameters) cil managed

Docs.param: The collection of security token policies.
The parameters to binding elements that control security tokens.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the security token attachment mode.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode> is an enumeration of the ways in which security tokens can be attached to messages. It includes the following members:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode.Endorsing>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode.Signed>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode.SignedEncrypted>
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode.SignedEndorsing>
